On.Terms: BehaviorLevel.PowerUserQueue.Start; Level 0; ValidateUnit NotDeadOrConstruction; IsStatus Created 0
BehaviorLevel.PowerUserQueue.Stop; Level 0; ValidateUnit NotDeadOrConstruction; IsStatus Created 0
